title: Looking for people to play with casually (for fun!)
body:
Hi my name is Kat and I just moved to the Oceania server from NA and I don't know anyone on here! The game's more fun with skype/teamspeak/curse & a team full of like-minded players.
I play mostly botlane, either support (preferred) or adc. I can play mid and top when needed but not really all that comfortable in the jungle. I love the odd ARAM to keep things interesting. I ranked Silver on NA, havent played ranked on Oceania yet and I'm not sure if I will or not.
I'm online most weeknights 6pm onwards (NZ time).
So yeah. Add me. Or don't! {{champion:267}}

replies.body: added you too if you're looking for casual people, my schedule is kinda here and there but i'm up for some norms with fun people when I'm around

Added you, my friends have stopped playing as much and having a premade with chat is better than solo queue. Used to play top lane but moved away from it, just got bored of it. Been having fun Mid and as ADC but haven't chosen another role yet. :)
